line.1.text: the new criterion of rupture is [as follows]: the equilibrium position, if equilibrium is possible, must be one in which rupture of the solid has occurred, if the system can pass from the unbroken to the broken condition by a process involving a continuous decrease in potential energy.  alan arnold griffith,
